name: Paperplanes
description: Paperplanes provides highly relevant, timely and personalised follow up to customers after they have engaged with a product or service. This could take the form of a prompt or reminder of the products/ services they were looking at, a discount or offer to encourage follow up or simply just a thank you for being an amazing customer and utilising a brands product or service. Customers and elements of personalisation in their ongoing comms with brands but few of us still feel like that is the experience we get

team.name: Daniel Dunn
team.bioHtml: Founder @Paperplanes • Worked at @dunnhumby

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description:
Who we are
 

We are an exciting start-up based in the City of London. With our SaaS platform Paperplanes is currently the only provider of programmatic direct mail in the UK which creates an incredible opportunity for growth. We are working with some of the most well-known brands in the UK, expanding our team as well as seeking external investment so this an ideal time for a lucky candidate to gain experience with a start-up on the ground floor

Who we are looking for
 

We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Account Manager to help build long lasting client engagements and help turn our exciting proposition into a leading marketing automation SaaS!

You will be comfortable managing vast and varied client engagements that span across numerous verticals and categories. You will be expected to take the initiative, challenge the status quo and be comfortable wearing many different hats and moving to where you are needed.

 

Requirements
 

·        Good level of data analysis and interpretation skills

·        Ability to work independently with impeccable client handling skills

·        Commercial awareness and proven client development capabilities

·        Solid project management skills

 

Desirable
 

·        Experience or high level of knowledge in digital marketing, programmatic and retargeted display preferred

Desired experience of Database Marketing or Analytics environment (client or service side)
Knowledge of database marketing principles
 

You are London based or willing to work in London. You are allowed to work in the UK

Please no recruitment agencies. We are exclusively looking for full-time, we do not work with contractors.

jobs.title: Back End Developer
jobs.description:
Who we are

We are a dynamic two-man start-up based in the City of London. With our SaaS platform Paperplanes in development, we are simultaneously disrupting both traditional direct mail and programmatic Adtech by creating a brand new channel – programmatic direct mail. We have already made large strides in the market, working with some of the most recognised brands in the UK and we are now looking for the next member to join our team.

We have ambitious plans to transform our system from the ground up and you have the chance to be here at the very start of our technical transformation. Join our exceptionally driven team who give their all to assist our amazing clients, and more importantly, to assist each other in the continual pursuit of excellence


We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic back-end developer to help turn our exciting proposition into a leading marketing automation SaaS! 
The successful candidate will need to be completely proficient with all aspects of SQL – stored procedures, CTEs, performance optimisation and more. Daily tasks will include, comms targeting for client campaigns, developing incremental functionality for our SaaS platform and creating automated analysis for campaigns. We live and breathe data so you will need to as well! 
You will be expected to take the initiative, challenge the status quo, be comfortable wearing many different hats and moving to where you are needed most. You will get to be the first hire of a growing team so you will receive a lot responsibilities and opportunities to grow.

Requirements 

•	Proficient SQL skills, specifically with SQL Server & MySQL.
•	Strong Analytical skills, the ability to bring data to life.
•	Competent in C# / .net framework.

Desirable

•	Knowledge of AWS EC2 infrastructure systems and Windows Servers.
•	An understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3.
•	Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery and Angular JS.
•	Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS.
•	Knowledgeable working with; Agile, TDD, BDD, data, UI, UX, cloud, caching, and scaling.
•	University degree in computer science or equivalent.

You are London based or willing to work in London. You are allowed to work in the UK

Please no recruitment agencies. We are exclusively looking for full-time, we do not work with contractors.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
We are a dynamic two-man start-up based in the City of London. With our SaaS platform Paperplanes in development, we are simultaneously disrupting both traditional direct mail and programmatic Adtech by creating a brand new channel – programmatic direct mail. We have already made large strides in the market, working with some of the most recognised brands in the UK and we are now looking for the next member to join our team.

We have ambitious plans to transform our system from the ground up and you have the chance to be here at the very start of our technical transformation. Join our exceptionally driven team who give their all to assist our amazing clients, and more importantly, to assist each other in the continual pursuit of excellence. 

We are looking for an ambitious, driven and relentless individual to head up our Business Development function. We have a strong bank of case studies across all categories and are now looking for the perfect motivated member to help drive awareness of our offering and create new sales opportunities.

Key Requirements

•	Generate scheduled and qualified sales opportunities using any required support from the wider team when applicable

o	Utilise personal networks to generate leads
o	Grow value generated from existing clients as well as regularly winning new business
o	Key enabler in the ongoing evolution of our offering
o	Effective use of social media such as Linkedin to win new business
o	Regular reporting with high levels of accuracy
o	Ensure prospect databases are regularly maintained and up to date

•	Help optimise overall marketing / campaign feedback for Paperplanes
o	Provide input into digital marketing activity to generate qualifies sales leads
o	Provide market positioning intelligence for existing product set 

•	Over deliver on expectations ensuring the highest possible level of service to prospects and clients:
Any prospects are always followed up with information or response to agreed timescales and quality levels
o	The prospect understands Paperplanes potential contribution to their business
o	Effective opportunity management from initial contact to purchase order / invoice
o	Maintaining efficient internal processes that ultimately maximises sales activity
o	Key ambassador of Paperplanes ensuring contact with potential prospects is always professional 
o	All prospecting and sales practices are compliant and professional

•	Work with CEO team to support a professional on-boarding process and management for all clients 
o	Transfer client requirements into on-boarding plans and processes
o	Support initial set-up and handover process
o	Provide digital analysis as required for new and existing clients 
o	Support training programmes through acquiring deep knowledge of analytics, data and digital products and their applications 


Main objectives:

•	To deliver against an agreed revenue target for Paperplanes within 19/20
•	To generate and adequately follow up with prospects in a way that generates incremental sales 
•	To grow value from existing clients creating long and profitable working relationships with key suppliers
